title: mandira vaDivanE
sahitya:
mandira vaDivanE matakaLIrE malaraDiyiNaiyE manadiDai ninaivEn


anupallavi

  aindu tiruk-karanE Azhi pOl arivanE sindhUra vaNNanE shemmai indirEshanE


caraNam    shankaran yOgamum shaktiyin ATRalum pongiDum mudalvanE bOdhamei jnAnamE 
tungamuyar tavat-turavigaL shErDamE engum niraindAl inbamE iraiyE
